sourcesContent:
<template>
	<gmap-map
		:center="center"
		:zoom="9"
	>

        <GmapMarker
            :key="marker"
            v-for="(m, marker) in markers"
            :position="m"
            :clickable="true"
            :draggable="false"
            @click="onMarkerClick(m.id)"
        />

	</gmap-map>
</template>

<script>
    import { db } from '../main'

	export default {
	    data () {
	        return {
                center: { lat: 45.508, lng: -73.587 },
                markers: []
	        }
        },
        firestore (){
            return{
                markers: db.collection('markers')
            }
        },
        mounted() {
            this.geolocate();
        },
	    methods: {
            onMarkerClick (id) {
	            this.$router.push({ name: 'graficos',params:{Pid:id} })
	        },
            geolocate: function() {
                navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(position => {
                    this.center = {
                        lat: position.coords.latitude,
                        lng: position.coords.longitude
                    };
                });
            }
        }
	}
</script>

<style>
.vue-map-container {
  width:100%;
  float: left;
  height: 600px;
  display: block;
}
</style>
